subject: Cannot access dashboard after password reset
description: I reset my password via the forgot-password flow but now get a 403 Forbidden error when logging in. Tried clearing cookies and different browsers. Account email: alice.chen@techstartup.io

subject: Request for bulk license pricing

subject: Data export taking over 24 hours

subject: Incorrect charge on February invoice
description: February invoice shows $299.98 but our contract rate is $149.99/month for DataSync Enterprise. Please investigate duplicate charge and issue credit.
